statements: SELECT * FROM RemoteServers WHERE status = 'Online';
SELECT server_name, location FROM RemoteServers WHERE cpu_usage > 80;
SELECT server_name, status FROM RemoteServers WHERE memory_usage < 50 AND storage_usage > 75;
SELECT server_id, location, network_traffic FROM RemoteServers WHERE location LIKE 'US%';
SELECT server_name, cpu_usage, memory_usage, storage_usage, network_traffic FROM RemoteServers WHERE cpu_usage < 50 ORDER BY server_name DESC;
SELECT server_id, server_name, location FROM RemoteServers WHERE status = 'Online';
SELECT server_name, memory_usage FROM RemoteServers WHERE memory_usage > 80;
SELECT server_id, server_name, cpu_usage, storage_usage FROM RemoteServers WHERE location = 'US' AND network_traffic < 100;
SELECT * FROM RemoteServers ORDER BY cpu_usage DESC, memory_usage ASC;
SELECT server_name, location, storage_usage FROM RemoteServers WHERE storage_usage > 50 ORDER BY location ASC, server_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM remote_servers;
SELECT server_name, status FROM remote_servers WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM network_infrastructure ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT id, device_name, status FROM network_infrastructure WHERE device_type = 'router';
SELECT id, device_name, performance_metrics->'cpu_usage' AS cpu_usage FROM network_infrastructure WHERE status = 'operational';
SELECT id, server_name FROM remote_servers WHERE status='active';
SELECT * FROM network_infrastructure WHERE device_type='router' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, device_name, device_type FROM network_infrastructure WHERE status='operational' AND device_name LIKE '%switch%';
SELECT * FROM remote_servers WHERE server_name='Main Server' AND performance_metrics->>'CPU_usage' > '80' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, server_name, status, performance_metrics->>'memory_usage' AS memory_usage_percentage FROM remote_servers WHERE status='inactive' ORDER BY server_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM server_status ORDER BY server_name ASC
SELECT server_name, server_location FROM server_status WHERE status = true
SELECT server_name, performance_metrics->>'cpu_usage' AS cpu_usage FROM server_status WHERE server_location = 'New York'
SELECT network_name, network_location, latency FROM network_status ORDER BY latency DESC
SELECT incident_id, incident_timestamp, incident_description FROM incident_log WHERE incident_type = 'security'
SELECT * FROM server_status WHERE status = true ORDER BY server_name ASC
SELECT server_name, server_location, performance_metrics FROM server_status WHERE server_location = 'USA' AND status = false
SELECT incident_timestamp, incident_description FROM incident_log ORDER BY incident_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT network_name, network_location, latency, bandwidth FROM network_status WHERE latency > 50 AND bandwidth > 100 ORDER BY network_location
SELECT incident_id, incident_type FROM incident_log WHERE incident_type = 'critical'
SELECT * FROM servers;
SELECT server_name, server_ip FROM servers WHERE status = 'Online';
SELECT server_name, status FROM servers WHERE server_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_type DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_status FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT * FROM servers;
SELECT server_name, server_ip, status FROM servers WHERE status = 'Online';
SELECT server_name, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM servers s JOIN server_logs l ON s.server_id = l.server_id GROUP BY server_name;
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_status FROM network_devices WHERE device_status = 'Active' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT s.server_name, p.metric_name, p.metric_value, p.metric_timestamp FROM servers s JOIN performance_metrics p ON s.server_id = p.server_id ORDER BY p.metric_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM ServerStatus;
SELECT server_name, status FROM ServerStatus WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM NetworkDevices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT metric_id, cpu_usage, memory_usage FROM ServerMetrics WHERE cpu_usage > 70;
SELECT status, last_update FROM NetworkStatus WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT server_name, status FROM ServerStatus WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT device_name, device_type, ip_address FROM NetworkDevices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT server_name, status, last_update FROM ServerStatus ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT device_name, ip_address, device_type FROM NetworkDevices WHERE ip_address LIKE '192.168.%';
SELECT server_name, cpu_usage, memory_usage, storage_usage FROM ServerMetrics ORDER BY cpu_usage DESC;
